policies.name: Maximum Meeting Duration
policies.message: Meetings longer than 4 hours should be split into multiple sessions for better productivity

policies.name: Buffer Time Between Meetings
policies.message: Recommended to have at least 5-minute buffer between back-to-back meetings

policies.name: Business Hours Compliance
policies.message: Meeting scheduled outside typical business hours (9 AM - 5 PM)

policies.name: Large Meeting Approval Required
policies.message: Meetings with 20+ attendees require executive approval before scheduling

policies.name: Weekend Scheduling
policies.message: Meeting scheduled on weekend - ensure attendees are aware

policies.name: Late Night Meeting Warning
policies.message: Meeting scheduled after 8 PM - consider attendee timezones

policies.name: Early Morning Meeting Warning
policies.message: Meeting scheduled before 7 AM - consider attendee timezones

policies.name: Minimum Attendees Required
policies.message: Meeting should have at least 2 attendees (consider if 1-on-1 is needed)
